subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
P . italicus : Istituto Sperimentale
per la Zoologia Agraria, Firenze, Italy ; of
P . tenuipes
: National Museum, Dublin, Ireland ; of
L . ( E .) michaeli
: National Museum of Ireland , (cited as Irish National Museum), Dublin, Ireland .

TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
P . italicus : Udine
, Italy , under rotting leaves in marshes; of
P . tenuipes : Glencree
, Dublin, Ireland , in moss on a stone in a mountain stream; of
L . ( E .) michaeli : Mill
Bay, Land's End, England , on unstated substrate.

NOTE : specimens reported as
L . ( L .) tenuipes
by
Schweizer ( 1922 : 43 )
were re-identified as
Platyseius major
by
Halbert ( 1923 : 373 )
,
Evans & Hyatt ( 1960 : 47 )
and
Christian & Karg ( 2006 : 239 )
.
